name: Love Hurts Basketball Shorts

brandingTech.logo: main body panels (front and back): Repeating graphic of an orange rose on a white cloud motif; right front thigh: Large cursive text 'Love Of'; lower left front side panel: Detailed embroidered graphic of a single rose with stem and leaves on a cloud; center of back bottom pentagon panel: Detailed embroidered graphic of a cluster of roses with stem and leaves on a light blue cloud/water element; side panels and back bottom pentagon panel background: Black mesh fabric with a repeating pattern of small white dots; borders of side panels and back bottom pentagon panel: Decorative trim featuring two thin red stripes flanking a white stripe, bordered by black

logos.description: Repeating graphic of an orange rose with green leaves on a white cloud background.
logos.size: Each rose graphic approx. 3-4 inches tall/wide

logos.description: Stylized script text 'Love' with a black dotted pattern inside the 'L'.
Black pentagonal-shaped panel outlined with a thick red border, featuring a graphic of three red roses with green leaves and light blue water/mist.
logos.color: Red (border and roses), Green (leaves), Light Blue (water/mist), Black (panel background)
logos.size: Pentagon approx. 8 inches tall/wide; Roses graphic approx. 4 inches tall/wide

logos.description: Black pentagonal/star-shaped panel outlined with a thick red border, featuring a single orange/red rose with green leaves.
logos.size: Pentagon/star approx. 5 inches tall/wide; Rose graphic approx. 2.5 inches tall/wide

logoFingerprint.notes: The black mesh panels (side and pentagonal) are cut and sewn fabric elements, not decoration techniques. The black waistband and striped hems are knitted trims, part of garment construction and do not feature additional applied branding elements in the visible areas.

modelPose: Athletic editorial stance, showing front and side graphic, powerful energy
setting: Baroque theater stage lit with dramatic crimson spots, dark grandeur
